Hi Phuguet,

This is by design.  Since we don't know what control you're going to put into the CellTemplate of the DataGridTemplateColumn, we wouldn't know what property to map the DataFieldBinding to.  The recommended way to accomplish this by setting the binding on the correct property of the control in the CellTemplate, which you should be able to do in the code behind.

Thanks!
Samantha
